Description.Text: Liberty Hotel offers accommodation in the heart of Athens. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property, while free private parking is possible of site. Each room at Liberty Hotel opens to a balcony with views of the city. Every unit is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom features a shower, while some are also equipped with hydro-massage panel. The 24-hour front desk staff can assist with car hire services. The lively area of Monastiraki, featuring an abundance of shops and taverns, is a approximately 3.5 km while Syntagma Square is at 3 km. Athens International Airport is at 36 km.
